textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 29in / 74cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in Bali. Hand wash. 100% rayon. Fabric: Voile. A sleeveless Indah dress in a bright, cheery print. Smocking and ruching shape the easy silhouette, while side cutouts add sultry appeal. Drawstrings secure the double-keyhole neckline. Unlined. Semi-sheer. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by the art and natural beauty of Indonesia, Indah clothing is handmade in Bali with traditional techniques, using natural organic fibers and plant-based dyes. Conceived in Hawaii by Libby De Santis, Indah (meaning "beautiful") complements women's lifestyles, from practicing yoga in India to sipping martinis in NYC. And, above all, Indah is committed to high-quality fabrics, preserving the Balinese arts and environment, and giving back to Indonesian communities. See all Indah reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available
